name: The Adventures of a Legend - Beyond Survival
summary:
Get adventures and face the challenges of a Legend. A world of fantasy.  
  
Many years ago in distant lands, the secrets of the incidents, which gave rise the appearance of strange creatures and the changing of the world into a world of fantasies and adventures, were guarded by The Ancients and this marks the beginning of the First Era. Over the years, the creatures have become more dangerous, the adventures have become very risky and the changes in the world occurred in a bad way.  
Today, twenty-one years later, the last ancient decided to challenge and confront the world and its challenges. The last heroes should venture into The Adventures of a Legend and so, guided by The Ancient, bring peace to the world.  
  
The Adventures of a Legend - Beyond Survival is the beginning of a series of adventures in a world of mysteries and fantasies.  
  
You can venture yourself into the survival mode or explore the world.  
  
In the survival mode, you will be challenged to stay alive and collect as many fragments of stars and coins as possible.  
Exploring the world, you must complete the missions and challenges that will come your way. The Ancient will guide you and help you with all his wisdom.  
  
Next updates:  
New mysteries, secrets, adventures and missions are being discovered, and they will soon be available in the world as well.  
  
Collect as many fragments and coins as you can to buy extra jumps and upgrades for your heroes. New attributes and items are coming. You should continue collecting coins to use as soon as new attributes become available.  
  
Most of all, we hope that you have fun. Your opinion is very important to us, you can help us improving the game. You can tell us what you think about the game and what you want in the game.
